ops.description: fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // TV Producer
“What the hell was that soldier doing?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // AD
“They just shot up!!”
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // “We did it!”{PAUSE}“Send that soldier something special.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // “Really.”{PAUSE}“I want somebody to send that soldier
an expensive gift.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:25}); // “Hmm…”{PAUSE}“Better send that soldier something.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:17}); // AD
“This's terrible!
Am…am I fired?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // “What!?
You're FIRED!!”{PAUSE}“Send that soldier
a bomb or something!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // “I'll go first!
Now you watch close
and do as I do, rookie!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:11}); // “Just sneak into the back of the
line when you see an opening.”

ops.raw: d0 8c 03 77 fa fa ff c5 04 a6 ff 00 00

dialogStrings:
“Just GO!
Then you just nonchalantly
sneak in from the back!
Make sure no one sees you!”

“Now listen up!
This parade's gonna be broadcast
live on Shinra TV around the world!”{PAUSE}“If you look bad, the whole Junon army
will look bad.
Remember that and don't screw up!”{PAUSE}“OK!
Jump in when I give you the sign!”{PAUSE}“Just sneak in from the back!
Don't mess up the row!”{PAUSE}“And no matter what you do, don't try
to go in from the front!”

“I'll go first!
Now you watch close
and do as I do, rookie!”

“Just sneak into the back of the
line when you see an opening.”

TV Producer
“What the hell was that soldier doing?”

“Really.”{PAUSE}“I want somebody to send that soldier
an expensive gift.”
“We did it!”{PAUSE}“Send that soldier something special.”

“What!?
You're FIRED!!”{PAUSE}“Send that soldier
a bomb or something!”
